content.text: The \(n\)th term of a sequence is \(5n - 3\)
Write down the first three terms of the sequence
Find the value of \(7x + 3y\) when \(x = 12\) and \(y = -6\)
The diagram shows two parallel lines \(P A Q\) and \(S B C T\)
\(A B = A C\) and angle \(Q A C = 43^{\circ}\)
The height, \(h\) metres, of a boy is \(1.72 \text{m}\), correct to the nearest centimetre
Complete this statement about the value of \(h\)
Work out the lowest common multiple (LCM) of 18 and 21
Work out the size of one exterior angle of a regular octagon
Calculate \(\sqrt{2.38 + 6.4^2}\) , writing down your full calculator display
Write your answer to part (a) correct to 4 decimal places
Enlarge the rectangle using a scale factor of 3 and centre of enlargement \(O\)
A box contains 3 blue pens, 4 red pens and 8 green pens only
A pen is chosen at random from the box
Find the probability that this pen is green
A cube has only one of its six faces painted yellow
Work out the expected number of times that it lands on the yellow face

content.text: From this list, write down the two numbers that are irrational

content.text: Here is a description of a quadrilateral
It has rotational symmetry of order 2
Write down the mathematical name of this quadrilateral
Write down two geometrical properties of a parallelogram
Write down the name of the solid made from this net
Work out the volume of this solid
The net of a solid is drawn on a \(1\mathrm{cm}^2\) grid
Without using your calculator, work out \(1\frac{3}{4}\times \frac{6}{35}\)
You must show all your working and give your answer as a fraction in its simplest form
You must show all your working
Omar wants to show the information from the table in a pie chart
Calculate the sector angle for the people who visited the cinema 5 times
40 people were asked how many times they visited the cinema in one month
